titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the International Institute (University of Michigan) records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: University of Michigan unit devoted to exchanging knowledge and resources accross campus and with institutions worldwide by bringing in scholars, funding overseas research and study, and collaborating with campus programs, including eighteen centers and programs under the institute.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minutes and meeting books for executive committee and governing board meetings, covering November 1993 to April 1999.
